entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • something.Where(predicate).FirstOrDefault() is faster than something.FirstOrDefault(predicate) #100378
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.MT.Blazor.SimpleMultiThreadedTests timed out #100373
  • [API Proposal]: Regex.EnumerateSplits #100369
    9.0.0
  • Fix behavior of (uint)val in Mono to saturating behavior #100368
  • Test failure: JIT\HardwareIntrinsics\Arm\Sve\Sve_ro\Sve_ro.cmd #100366
  • Test failure: Interop\StringMarshalling\VBByRefStr\VBByRefStrTest\VBByRefStrTest.cmd #100363
  • [API Proposal] Expand ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType, HashAlgorithmType #100361
    9.0.0
  • Trimmer fails with IL1012 when building a MAUI app #100357
  • Assertion failed 'change >= 0' #100350
  • CI doesn't build `net9.0` targets in source generators. #100346
    9.0.0
  • HTTP Stress pipeline improvements #100339
    Future
  • NET 8 Application crashes without a StackTrace Code: 0xc0000409 #100335
  • System.Threading.Timer uses wrong TimeSpan property for "period" on linux-bionic-arm native aot #100332
  • Time-outs in `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` on Windows/arm64 CoreCLR #100328
  • Byte[] initializer error Expression or initializer expected #100325

Closed

  • Missing TimeProvider implementation for Azure Function .NET Isolated #98860
  • Build linux-x64 Debug Mono_MiniJIT_LibrariesTests failure #99942
  • Activity.SpanId is 0000000000000000 on .NET Framework #100329
  • System.Linq.Enumeration.Chunk - CS0121: The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties #100370
  • BackgroundService cancellation is logged as failure if host is still starting #98935
    9.0.0
  • MethodInfo Invoke with [Optional] argument as Type.Missing fails #100322
  • Simple double multiplication returns wrong result #100367
  • riscv64 builds fail with "No usable version of clang found." error #100215
  • JIT_NewS_MP_FastPortable is slow for Orchard CMS benchmark on Linux-arm64 #99552
    9.0.0
  • Linux/arm64: Higher CPU utilization without ThreadPool_UnfairSemaphoreSpinLimit=0 #100348
  • [nativeaot] System.IO.FileSystem.Tests fail with `The parameter is incorrect.` #100343
  • Failed to setup SSL connection with .NET8 Linux-Container Image with failure "Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream" #98797
    9.0.0
  • Cannot set ReadMode after creating a NamedPipeClientStream instance #83072
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize/Serialize using JsonTypeInfo fails on Type emitted using TypeBuilder.CreateType #100305
  • `OpenStandardInput` in PublishAot throws if stdin is closed #100321
  • FileStream Flush(true) significant performance degradation in .NET 8 when buffer size is bigger than the payload #100229
  • Json data parsing in MAUI .NET 8 #100312
  • Reading from `Console.OpenStandardInput` hangs forever when stdin is closed #100323

PullRequests

Created

  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    NO-MERGE, area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix for stress failure when adjusting effective IP while stackwalking may put it on a wrong instruction. #100376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix class construction cycle in Lock on NativeAOT #100374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #100372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add hash operation counts to OpenSSL to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add support for the ISOSDacInterface14 api #100364
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix a linker warning with the JsonSerializerOptionsUpdateHandler #100362
    area-System.Text.Json
  • FixOptRepeat without optAssertionProp_Update fix #100360
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FixOptRepeat without AssertionProp handle asserts #100359
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • FixOptRepeat without VNForCast fix #100355
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Basic docs #100354
    documentation, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • FixOptRepeat without ParseArrayAddress fix #100353
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CA2022 warnings (Avoid inexact read with 'Stream.Read') #100352
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove support for non-indirect code headers #100351
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix exception interception on ARM64 with new EH #100349
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add support for frozen structs in Swift reverse pinvokes #100344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `Int128` checked-convert to signed IntX #100342
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [ppc64le] Fixed insufficient memory exception issue #100337
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Disable terminal logger experience for dotnet test in manual tests. #100333
    area-System.Console
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add more checking to `GenTreeArrAddr::ParseArrayAddress()` #100327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JitOptRepeat to JIT experimental AzDO pipeline #100326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove requirement for building packs to run host tests and infrastructure around restoring test project assets #100324
    area-Host

Merged

  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Don't log error from background service if host is gracefully stopped while still starting #100032
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Convert asserts in CEEInfo::getStaticFieldContent() to 'if' checks #100320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix regex generator CA1872 warnings #100345
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support building against clang 18 #100258
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add arch_info for TARGET_RISCV64 #100341
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove concept of temporary dynamic IL #100318
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove preventing EH and entering EE at shutdown #100293
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Support setting NamedPipeClientStream.ReadMode with PipeAccessRights ctor overload #100001
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][infra] Disable failing tests/pipelines on runtime-extra-platforms #100227
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] reduce use of wrap_error_root #100233
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Move last P/Invoke error from native Thread and delete C/C++ SafeHandle implementation #100267
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HttpStress] [SslStress] Workaround image bug in 1es-windows-2022-open #100303
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Run HTTP3 stress with Adress sanitization #100023
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Roll back conversion of native aot tests to merged model #100269
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Apply eslint formatting in JS/TS #100271
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Disable msvc vectorization in GC get_promoted_bytes #100309
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] fix bit width from 32 to 8 for managed boolean #100304
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update doc on using local apphost to reflect that the testhost layout uses the live-built host #100314
    area-Host

Updated

  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • BinaryWriter perf improvements #99775
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Data Descriptor Spec #100253
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Allow trimming FeatureGuard and FeatureSwitchDefinition attributes #100263
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Force interpreter to initialize the pointers #100288
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [8.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99583
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.5
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99582
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.30
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ci] Fix Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #100074
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Make sure we compact the LOH when aggressive GC is requested #98954
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap or malloc when loading bytes into heap #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-GC-mono
  • JIT: Add separate ABI classifiers for x86/win-x64/SysV-x64/ARM64 #100276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Align up structs to IntPtr.Size if they have gc pointers #100289
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Several improvements / simplifications in Regex #100315
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.x
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Eliminate unused virtual methods we detect after optimizations #100286
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
